.. _settingup:

Starting your learning
======================

This section will teach you *how* to navigate our website and how you can get started with learning 5G and its relevant counterparts

Sample subheading
-------------------

Sample subheading2
-------------------

* What do you want to learn
* how you can learn it
* test your knowledge
